item.title: LTC Leave travel
item.description: Intro An employee with one year of continuous service on the date of journey performed by him/his family is eligible for leave travel concession. Types Hometown LTC admissible irrespective of the distance. In the Four year block two home-town trips are eligible in two calendar year blocks. Current two year block is 2018-19 and 2020-21. Any one hometown may be converted to all India LTC. ALL INDIA LTC A employee and family can visit anywhere in India once in a block of 04 years.
